My Homepage

Aim High and Down to Earth.

Hello!
I am a first year Ph.D student in The Chinese University of Hong Kong university, supervised by Prof. Jiaya Jia. I got M.Phil. degree in Institute of Automation Chinese Academy of Sciences and B.Eng. in Beihang University.

My research interests mainly lie in Computer Vision and AutoML.
To know more about me, please refer to my Google Scholar.
